entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:09 p.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 13.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 3:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 13.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 32 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
